page.title: 06Living on Dartmoor
page.content: I like living on Dartmoor because it is lovely,fresh and clean and people are friendly. We get a lot of visitors down here in the summer and it gets very busy.I don't like it much then because I have to queue for ages at the shop.School is fun and we use the swimming pool in the summer when it is hot. The village has quite a lot for its size and we have a newsagent,several gift shops and a Post Office.We have three cafes,a supermarket and an excellent libary. You can go for long walks to the tors which are all round us and there are lots of{'Letter Boxes'}which you can try and find.If you get bored during the week there's Youth Club on Tueday, Brownies on Wednesday,Guides on Thursday and a Disco on Friday. It's really fun living on Dartmoor.
